page.title: 11THE MOTORWAY
page.content: On one of our Domesday Survey walks, some people interviewed a motorway worker.The motorway workers are working on the new M42 motorway.The M42 will be linked to the M5.It has taken about two and a half years to build. It is supposed to be ready for August 1985,because they have now completed painting the white lines,and have only the 'cats eyes'to insert. It is roughly fourteen miles long, and over two million pounds has been spent on just the Umberslade section. The opening of this new section, bringing the link_up with the M5,will bring many changes to this area. Travelling to the South will be much easier for both business and pleasure.
